900334080.baseEffect_: Put a random Runecraft follower from your deck into your hand.

"Love is naught but a fabrication."
With her words, love itself perished from Ville de l'Amour.
Nothing short of a miracle would return love to this place.

116322010.baseEffect_: Last Words: If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, summon a Guardian Golem.
116322010.baseFlair_: A spoon of elmwood, a jasper bowl of laraeya, and a silver throne... I'm not sure what's going to happen, but I haven't let any reagents go to waste.

115311010.baseEffect_:
Ward.

Onmyodo. It appears from within the shadows of history. During a certain emperor's reign, it becomes a popular form of fortune-telling in the capital.

Nobles enjoy Onmyodo and come to use it in their everyday lives. It can make predictions concerning matters of the heart, epidemics, and even the course of battle.

900311010.evoFlair_: Huh? Why am I wearing clothes if I'm made of snow? Humph! Are snowmen not allowed to be interested in fashion now?

900311040.baseFlair_: This haphazard pile of scrap metal moves with an ominous screech.
900311040.evoFlair_: This mountain of scrap metal slays the foes of its master.

900311060.evoEffect_: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to both leaders.
900311060.evoFlair_: Argh! What the squeak is going on? And why'd you have to make me look so ratty?

900311070.baseEffect_: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

900311070.evoFlair_: One day, the young beast collected flowers around the academy to bring them to the girl, for this day was the one year anniversary of their union.

117321010.evoFlair_: With deft paws and mental fortitude, the magic gems dance and twirl, forming shapes from which myriad enigmas abound. The moggy observes the crowd, waiting for just the right moment to dazzle them with the grand finale.

113331010.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a follower, gain +0/+1.

Whenever you play a spell, gain +2/+0.

705314010.baseFlair_: Time for Professor Cagliostro's super-special crash course: Alchemy for Absolute Morons!

Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.

The experiment's a huge success. Wow, am I good, or am I good?
—A Mage, in the Exploded Ruins of His Study

900314020.baseFlair_: Dragons aren't the only ones who breathe fire when they're angry.

The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.

102312040.baseFlair_: Sure it's thrown together, but it's better than nothing!

105312010.baseFlair_: Tincture, elixir, or just today's lunch? No one knows but her.

113312010.baseFlair_:
Ingredients: black-tail lizard, firesnake powder, bat heart

To-do list: Get a new cauldron
—Messy scribbling from a witch's notepad

106312010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another Earth Sigil amulet is in play, perform Earth Rite - Draw a card. Recover 1 play point.

900312010.baseEffect_: (This is an Earth Sigil amulet that can be used to activate Earth Rite effects.)

100311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Both players draw a card.
100311010.baseFlair_: Come one, come all, and prepare to be amazed by the greatest magic show the world has ever seen! Be sure to tell your friends!

101311010.evoEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, gain +1/+0 until the end of the turn.

101311020.baseFlair_: Though the wizard himself might die, his knowledge is passed on to the next generation.
101311020.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon an Earth Essence.
101311020.evoFlair_: Even should some evildoer reduce his body to ash, the knowledge he fostered will be passed down forever.

101311060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Put a Conjure Guardian into your hand.

101311060.evoFlair_: Arcane enigma! I've done it—an entirely new tincture! Failure truly is the mother of success.

103311030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Spellboost a follower in your hand 2 times.

103311030.evoFlair_: There's no way I can stop the runaway magic on my own. But with all of you here, things will be okay! Fight alongside me, everyone!

105311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card if the number of Neutral cards in your hand equals or exceeds the number of Runecraft cards in your hand (excluding this card).

105311030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.

105311030.evoFlair_: This mystical critter has an important role in the early spring. It releases the magical energy it stored up during winter to create a flower garden for incoming students.

106311030.baseFlair_: You shouldn't treat familiars as if they were simple servants. They are irreplaceable companions deserving of trust. They are the rescuers of lonely old magicians, saving them from a life of solitude. —Familiars: An Introduction, Chapter 1
106311030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand 2 times.
106311030.evoFlair_: Do not depend on their devotion, for that is not their purpose. To truly be a good fit for your familiar, you must work to improve yourself. Only then will your familiar's power increase. And wouldn't that be handy? —Familiars: An Introduction, Chapter 6

107311020.baseEffect_: Last Words: If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle.
107311020.baseFlair_: Welcome, promising wizards and witches of the future, to Mysteria. Here, you will unravel the secrets to sorcery—I will do my best to guide you on this journey.

107311020.evoFlair_: An explosion outside, you say? Ah, that must be Ms. Miranda. Just like when she was a student... Some things never change.

108311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random spell from your deck into your hand.
108311010.baseFlair_: The future's just like, phew! Nobody can be sure what'll happen, so it can't be put into words. But I'll bet your future is, like, fwoosh and brrrr!
108311010.evoFlair_: Your future's going to be all fwoosh and brrrr! Huh, don't you understand? Then hold on for a moment! I'll burn you—fwoosh—and freeze you—brrrr!

108311030.baseEffect_: Clash: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.
108311030.baseFlair_: It's been years and years since I started learning magic. One day before I knew it, I was standing on two legs! Who knows, I might become human before long!
108311030.evoFlair_: It's been years and years since I started learning magic. I'm still not a real mage, but someday I'll tell that girl just how I feel!

109311010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
109311010.baseFlair_:
"Howdy! Pleasure to meetcha!"
"You guys are real... Right?"
109311010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
109311010.evoFlair_:
"I'm not sure if I'll ever be as good as her... But one day I want to be a great witch, just like Grandmother."
"That's the spirit, Anna!"
"But then again... it's too bright to go outside..."

110311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a Mysteria follower (excluding Owen, Knight of Mysteria) from your deck into your hand.
110311010.baseFlair_: Right now I'm not a knight—I'm just another student of Mysteria Academy. So I'll study magic like a good pupil... while I watch over the princess from the shadows.
110311010.evoFlair_: If anything threatens the princess, I'll use all my knowledge and strength to defend her. With my enchanted blade, I can slice through any spell... Just try and stop me!

111311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no allied Earth Sigil amulets in play, summon an Earth Essence.
111311010.baseFlair_: A little heresy is imperative to sorcery, wouldn't you say? Listen, rabbit, the gift of speech is nothing to sniff at. You may have lost your colony, but you've gained incredible wisdom. —A fickle wizard
111311010.evoFlair_: Sorcery is the way of righteousness—as long as you use your gift in the name of good, magic will always be your ally. So go on, then. Return to your colony with your newfound insight. —A fickle wizard

112311030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Cayman, Mysterian Butler into your hand.
112311030.baseFlair_: Wahahaha! Ladies and gentlemen of Mysteria! Bask in my wealthy glory! I have no need for greetings—I give you my loose coins instead! Cayman! Ready my treasure so that I might shower it upon these plebes!
112311030.evoFlair_: I was born to stand above all others! No matter where I go, I'm always number one! Cayman! Ready my handkerchief, as I have moved myself to tears!

113311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put an Assembly Droid or Repair Mode into your hand.
113311010.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Rather than grow one's magical capabilities, there are now methods to improve magical efficiency... much to the dismay of a mechastaff sorcerer. —Research Archives of the Sorcerer's Guild, Vol. I
113311010.evoFlair_:
I mean, yeah, it's full of magical energy and whatever, but... Mine doesn't need to only work, it's gotta be efficient! See this? I only need an ounce of magic to get it working!
—Jetbroom Witch to Mechastaff Sorcerer

113311030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, deal 2 damage to an enemy.
113311030.baseFlair_:
They sparkle and glimmer ever so quickly... Enough to catch the eye of any cat. The sparks of the battlefield are just another plaything for that one.
—Lightning Shooter
113311030.evoFlair_:
Such a sparky, fluffy tail—and that adorable purr... Oh, I just can't! It's so cute, I could just go numb! You know what? I'm gonna hug it!
—Lightning Shooter

114311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, gain +2/+2.
114311010.baseFlair_: O still and stable earth. Foundation of matter and author of gravity. Cardinal direction: North. Domain of the Gnomes. You who chill and dry... Please, tell me. Will I be as strong and steadfast as you one day?
114311010.evoFlair_: O still and stable earth. Foundation of matter and author of gravity. Cardinal direction: North. Domain of the Gnomes. You who chill and dry... Please... Give me the strength to withstand and endure, just as you do!

114311030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain Rush and summon a Scrap Golem.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4.
114311030.baseFlair_:
Chief: Recurrence of uncontrolled behavior confirmed.
Manager: It's acting strange. Further experimentation required.
Trainee: What's with those weird poses it strikes?
—Records from a certain lab
114311030.evoFlair_:
Chief: Is this an incentive-related complication?
Manager: It's looking at us. Does it want something?
Trainee: Do you think... it just wants us to say "good job"?
—Records from a certain lab

115311020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Randomly put a copy of an allied amulet destroyed this match into your hand. If the amulet is a Naterran Great Tree, gain +2/+2.
115311020.baseFlair_: O volatile and fickle wind. Master of gentle endurance and change. Cardinal direction: East. Domain of the Sylphs. You who heat and dampen. Yours is a fine zephyr that brings windfalls aplenty... and I'll gladly gather them up.
115311020.evoFlair_: O volatile and fickle wind. Master of gentle endurance and change. Cardinal direction: East. Domain of the Sylphs. You who heat and dampen. The winds of fortune will bring me riches... I'll blow all my business rivals away.

Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Summon a Charming Gentlemouse. Give +1/+1 to all allied Charming Gentlemice.
Enhance (8) - Summon 2 and give +2/+2 instead.
Enhance (10) - Summon 3 and give +3/+3 instead.
115311030.baseFlair_: Heh... Have you perhaps been charmed by my flame? This blaze and I are much the same, you know... If you get too close, you might get burned. Squeak!
115311030.evoFlair_: Heh... I dedicate this light to you. This flare is much like you, you know... radiant and dazzling. Squeak!

116311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
116311010.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was discovered during magitech research. The resulting tool was capable of predicting detailed fortunes. This type of magical analysis and recursion wouldn't be possible without the boon of technology. —Magical Research Report
116311010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Change the cost of a random Repair Mode in your hand to 0.
116311010.evoFlair_: The reason we incorporated technology into our spells was to grasp the manifold possibilities of magic. By breaking down the world into its constituent elements, we become capable of anything. And modern technique is to thank for this miracle. —On Amplification

117311010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no allied Earth Sigil amulets in play, summon an Earth Essence. Otherwise, perform Earth Rite: Put a Golem Summoning into your hand.
117311010.baseFlair_: The Magician's raison d'être lies in creation. A flash of an idea sets ablaze the imagination, and the imagination constructs plans to set everything in motion. These inspired works of pride draw the eye and captivate the senses.
117311010.evoFlair_: The Magician is a vessel from which creation flows. Driven by the inexhaustible imperative for improvement, nothing can contain his conviction. He creates; therefore he is.

900311080.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
900311080.baseFlair_: You called for me, my lord? For you to choose to interact with the plebeians beneath you, your heart is even broader than the ocean... You never fail to impress me. Here you are. Scatter these gold coins to your heart's content.
900311080.evoFlair_: Lord Shirati used to be so small, but now he has grown enough to scatter all those gold coins... It's too bright a sight for these old eyes. I vow to serve him until the end of my days.

900311090.baseEffect_: Last Words: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
900311090.baseFlair_:
One, two, three, four. Voices echo in spite of themselves. The object housing a god stands on its own. Truly mysterious.

900311090.evoFlair_:
Onmyodo, a momentous curse. Terrifying, without a doubt. A tiny shikigami, like a child. The sight of it hard at work is truly precious.
—A Guide to Onmyodo: Introduction

101321040.baseFlair_: My circles can decipher the building blocks of life. Would you like to know the definition of beauty?
101321040.evoFlair_: Analysis leads to a greater appreciation of the world. Open your eyes, and I'll show you everything you've ever wanted to see.

103321030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.
103321030.baseFlair_: Diminutive in appearance, slight of build, and a keeper of limitless knowledge.
103321030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random card with Earth Rite from your deck into your hand.
103321030.evoFlair_: Diminutive in appearance, slight of build, and an endless wellspring of hidden arts.

104321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random card with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.
104321020.baseFlair_: Um, which way was the school again? This way? That way? The other way? Oh no, I'm gonna be late!
104321020.evoFlair_: I did it! I made it to school. Now watch me turn into a master sorceress. Fun spells, scary spells—I'm going to learn them all!

104321030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Earth Rite - Summon a Magic Illusionist.
104321030.baseFlair_: There are indeed tricks to my magic, but that doesn't mean anyone will be able to figure them out! Now behold as I reveal to you the rarely seen and horrific mysteries of immortality!
104321030.evoEffect_: Last Words: Earth Rite - Summon an unevolved Magic Illusionist.
104321030.evoFlair_: No matter how many times you freeze me, burn me, cut me, pierce me, or crush me, I shall only reappear in all my glory—at least until you finally figure out the trick.

108321020.baseEffect_: If you have at least 6 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Mysterian Whitewyrm or Mysterian Blackwyrm.
108321020.baseFlair_: Mysteria... This really takes me back. Not a thing's changed. Not the students' passion for studying magic... And not you shadowy fools who dare to enter without permission.
108321020.evoFlair_: I won't let you run roughshod over the young ones' future. Never. Flee the academy while I am still me!

112321020.baseEffect_: Whenever you play another Machina card, draw a card.
112321020.baseFlair_: The magic researchers' latest experiment was a success. We were able to create a metal pseudo-lifeform that moves on its own. A minimal amount of mana allows it to act alongside its fellow machines, leading to increased output. —Mage Association Research Report, Part 2
112321020.evoFlair_: The magical lifeform turned out splendidly thanks to the help of a strange machine. But a portion of mages objected against incorporating technology with magic. I imagine it will prove quite difficult to change their minds. —Comment about Magical Technology 2

116321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied amulets in play.
116321010.baseFlair_:
O still and stable earth. Foundation of matter and author of gravity. The essence of earth and wind is the very essence of the land itself. There's no load too heavy for it to bear... Wow.
—Geoelementist
116321010.evoFlair_:
The rain that should fall does not fall; the sun that should shine does not shine. This world is warped and its power fleeting. Our old ways have become putrefied by the new.
—Magica Principia, Part 2

116321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Earth Essence into your hand.
116321020.baseFlair_: No, no, I don't want any goody-goody opponent! It's not that I'm dark-hearted, I just want someone who will give it their all! Not that I plan on losing, of course.
116321020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Earth Rite - Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Earth Rite (2) - Deal 4 damage instead.
116321020.evoFlair_: Ahh! Now this is more like it! A devilishly fun bout between two upstanding fellows! Just don't cry when I unleash my dark power!

102331010.baseFlair_: Think I'm an old fool, you little whippersnapper? Well, you're right... I'm an ancient mage, and miserable to boot!
102331010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Crimson Sorcery into your hand.
102331010.evoFlair_: I guess I'm getting a little too old for this, but I can at least go out with a bang. Ahem... Brace yourselves, villains!

110331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card with Spellboost from your hand. Then put a random card with Spellboost that originally costs more than the discarded card from your deck into your hand and Spellboost it X times. X equals the number of times the discarded card had been Spellboosted.
110331020.baseFlair_: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Your true nature flutters in the depths of your soul. Call to it, release it, and achieve your purpose in life. Only then will the truth be revealed to you.
110331020.evoFlair_:
The Third Rite: Understand Truth
Truth: the original desire. To act in accordance with this urge is but a law of life.
—Teachings of the Assembly of Truth

900331010.baseFlair_: A dauntless snowman knight who sprang forth from the king of snowmen. To warm up the ever chilly monarch, he rubs the king's back.
900331010.evoFlair_: Since it serves as a bodyguard for the king, this knight wears armor. His one fault is that when warming up the king, his spear occasionally pokes the monarch in the rear.

900331020.baseFlair_: A dastardly snowman knight who sprang forth from the king of snowmen. To warm up the ever chilly monarch, he steals clothes from passersby.
900331020.evoFlair_: Since he leads the way for the king, this warrior has grown to tremendous proportions. His one fault is that, not understanding his own power, he accidentally tears the clothes he steals.

900331030.baseEffect_: Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
900331030.baseFlair_: Heretical life-forms created by a mage. They gather, shout, and plot in secret to destroy the world. "Bwa-ha-ha! Yay!"
900331030.evoFlair_: The world's destruction, the world's end. To the onions, its meaning is a mystery. They only wish to see the heartfelt smile of the mage who is their mother.

900331040.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
At the end of your opponent's turn, banish this follower.

900331040.evoFlair_:
The great spirit is faithful to his mistress, protecting her from all of her foes.
"Okay, spirit buddy! Give 'em everything you've got!"

111341030.baseFlair_:
"Back in my prime, we'd already be finished... Can't believe how long it's takin' me to cast spells these days."
"Taking on all of us on his own? That old coot's lost it!"
—Geos, Runehammer and an enemy officer

112341030.baseFlair_: There is a ring on his finger, a great ring that rules over all creation. The brass of this ring of wisdom commands the heavens, while the iron commands the earth. The king's name is Solomon, the founder of magic. —The Founding Mage, Prologue
112341030.evoFlair_: And so God asked the king who bore fate on his shoulders: What is your wish? What is your desire? The king replied with one single word: Wisdom. Great wisdom, previously unknown to man. —The Founding Mage, Final Act

Each turn, when you play an amulet for:
-The first time, gain +1/+1.

106331010.evoFlair_: Some flowers mustn't be plucked. Some flowers can't help but be plucked. One god sought out her beauty. After accepting the god's favor, she reached full bloom.

103311040.evoFlair_: When she asked me if I want to live forever, I politely declined. No point in enduring an eternity of yawns. —A certain villager

104311040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
104311040.baseFlair_: By using energy clean and pure, the white mage created a blessed golem that towered over her foes. Driven by the mage's heartfelt wishes, the golem crushed those foes, leaving lifeless hunks of meat in its wake.
104311040.evoFlair_: Regardless of whether the golem is driven by powers of good or evil, what is required of it remains the same: to smash and destroy as commanded.

105311020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if the number of Neutral cards in your hand equals or exceeds the number of Runecraft cards in your hand (excluding this card).
105311020.baseFlair_: My master's hidden arts! And this, my enchanted blade!
105311020.evoFlair_: Your ilk could never comprehend the depth of my master's power!

106311010.baseFlair_: The violet lightning strikes simply because it can do nothing else. She sharpens her magic and waits for that instant.
106311010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
106311010.evoFlair_: Her form, a bolt falling from the heavens. Her spearhead, flashing with violent violet lightning, pierces all.

108311020.baseFlair_: Glimmering moon! Resplendent darkness! Grant me power! I cannot be defeated so long as the moon is out! Never!
108311020.evoFlair_: The moonlight's magic is infinite! And I'm invincible while its power is mine. There's no way that you can win! Never!

112311020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have at least 2 other Machina cards in your hand, deal 3 damage to an enemy.
112311020.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was the development of a magical item. With the help of a mechanical staff, a retired elderly mage was able to recover the power he held in his heyday. —Mage Association Research Report, Part 1
112311020.evoFlair_: That mechanical staff is something else! The old man was beside himself. Even if you don't have enough mana, the machine's own power fills in the blanks. I wager that thing could be used to move something pretty enormous. —Comment about Magical Technology 1

117311030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers. If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, deal 3 damage instead.
117311030.baseFlair_: My best-selling potions? Let's see... The emerald green potion augments spells. It tastes like fire. The electric purple potion induces paralysis. It tastes like fire.
117311030.evoFlair_: You'd like to see my latest concoctions? Well, this ultramarine potion induces silence. It tastes like fire. The amber potion increases strength. It tastes like fire.

900311030.baseFlair_: The iron giant creaks into life whenever there is a threat to its master. Its single eye is a window into its pure heart.
900311030.evoFlair_: The guardian golem feels no hatred and no joy. It simply identifies and eliminates threats to its master. There is perhaps nothing more frightening than such well-meaning violence.

100321020.baseFlair_: The god of destruction quickens, scorching foul creatures one and all.
100321020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
100321020.evoFlair_: As the flames surged forth, no abomination was spared.

101321050.baseEffect_: When this follower comes into play, give your leader the following effect: Followers can't be played. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
101321050.baseFlair_: Cuhullin! A curse upon you and your ilk! Pray your death alone is enough to right the wrongs enacted against me.
101321050.evoEffect_: When this follower comes into play, give your leader the following effect: Followers can't be played. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
101321050.evoFlair_: This curse will never let you go, my dear boy. The day you break the curse is the day you die.

101321070.baseFlair_: Sounds like they're calling my name. Not a moment too soon either. My blades are ravenous for the taste of blood.
101321070.evoFlair_: Wielding blades with magic is an abomination? What does it matter once they're buried in the heart of your enemy?

102321010.baseFlair_: There's another girl who lives within me. She scares me. Please don't do anything to wake her.
102321010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Earth Rite - Summon a Guardian Golem.
102321010.evoFlair_: I'd never let the gods lay a hand on Remi or me. Now, my toys, dance to my melody. Dance!

106321010.baseEffect_:

106321010.baseFlair_: Eh, maybe I'm not as good as Pascale—but I'll save you with my dance!
106321010.evoFlair_: Doesn't matter the foe, we'll beat him! What would Pascale say? Probably something like, "I'll knock you out!"

107321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Both players draw a card.

107321010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Both players draw a card.
107321010.evoFlair_: With magic, anything is possible, and that's the truth! Are you ready? One, two, three... Abracadabra!

111321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Burgeoning Genius into your hand.
111321020.baseFlair_: My name is Palla. I'm a student teacher, in charge of the light arts. I'm... pleased to meet you. What? I look angry? No, I... I'm sorry. That's just my usual expression...
111321020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Subtract 1 from the cost of a Mysteria card in your hand.
111321020.evoFlair_: I'm still pretty green... and people tell me I seem standoffish. But I want to help you all realize your full potential. So, um... N-now... watch closely! Ah... that's not it. How does Miss Miranda do that?

109331020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon an Earth Essence.

109331020.evoFlair_: Hehe. Time for a one-on-one lesson from the founder of alchemy herself, so listen up. The deepest truth known to man iiiis this—the most adorable thing in the entire world is me, Cagliostro! The super cute genius alchemist!

111331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Morra, Monika's Familiar.
111331020.baseFlair_:
Lovely Brave Cure! Infinite Magic! You can call me Magical Girl Lovely-Heart Monika, the skies' most magical admiral! In the name of the skies, I'll lead you!
Phew! Being a magical girl is rough!
111331020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
111331020.evoFlair_: Looks and status mean nothing when it comes to helping people! Whether I'm a Valerian admiral or a magical girl, I'll always do my duty! Now follow me! We'll stop evil in its tracks!

113331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals 2 times the number of allied amulets in play.

"Surely you've heard of my name?"
​When asked by a great wizard, it's unwise to answer no.
​"No? Very well, allow me to introduce myself!"
​Rather than a traditional introduction, you'll most likely
receive a blast of magic to the face.

​When asked by a great wizard, it's unwise to answer yes.

stature with very important magical research, yes?"
You'll most likely never hear the end of it.

108341010.evoFlair_: The only thing I can do is to see. To listen to the voice of the world. So you're the one who decides. I leave the fate of the world in your hands.

----------
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
109341030.baseFlair_: The craft of witchery is rooted in practice and ritual, held dear to its followers. Rejecting tradition, she was branded a heretic. However, all who dared to challenge would perish before her—the unrivaled witch hunter.

109341030.evoFlair_: What purpose does tradition serve if it cannot defeat a heretic? Witchcraft's essence lies not within the process, but results. Skin besmirched with crimson—the mark of a formidable witch.

112341020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
Strike: Recover 1 play point.

Evolve: Put a Delta Cannon into your hand.
Strike: Recover 1 play point.
112341020.evoFlair_: If I had no emotions, then I would not feel sadness. There would be no need to grieve fallen friends. But I do not have that luxury. I have to oppose him for the sake of our very future.

Nine, ten. The one true shikigami. All others are merely pieces of rubbish scraped together.

900341020.evoFlair_:
Your minions are no more than playthings. This is what a real shikigami looks like. But have fun collecting those worthless scraps of paper.
—Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo

100314060.baseFlair_: One with my left hand, one with my right. Creating life is so simple.

101312020.baseFlair_: Don't worry! Me and my alchemy will distend you! Uh, defend. Defend you!

108323010.baseFlair_: We've worked so hard at our drills. I know we're gonna summon something seriously freaky! —A fledgling mage

101311080.evoEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, gain +1/+1.
101311080.evoFlair_: I know! I'll gift you an experience of aerial ecstasy before bringing you back down to earth headfirst! Splat!

102311060.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon an Earth Essence.
102311060.baseFlair_: An almost palpable magic infuses the winged gargoyle enshrined at the temple.
102311060.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon an Earth Essence.
102311060.evoFlair_: A vigilant winged gargoyle watches over the church. Its hidden magic is unleashed at the first sign of intruders.

103311050.baseEffect_: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
103311050.baseFlair_: I just wanted to summon something cool. But look at the ugly beastie I ended up with! —A student of Mysteria Academy
103311050.evoFlair_: I couldn't get away from the creature, but it grew on me after a while. Did you realize what a beautiful color its eyes are? —A student of Mysteria Academy

109311020.baseFlair_: Peace, harmony, and tranquility are all we need. War is but a futile and meaningless endeavor. Bloodstained warriors, won't you stay and listen to the words of this old man?
109311020.evoFlair_: It may seem like an impossible dream, but there is merit in striving for peace. Is wanting a world without conflict so wrong? If you won't listen to my words, perhaps I shall show you!

116311020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, return 1 to your hand and transform a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play into a Snowman.
116311020.baseFlair_:
O flowing, mutable water, master of gentle change and of conservation. Strengthen the essence of conservation, and become ice. Oh, just be careful not to freeze too much.
—Riley, Hydroshaman
116311020.evoFlair_:
We make use of the four elements through spirit mediums. However, these arts, the oldest of all magics, are currently under new threat. This is in no small part due to the steel uprising and its perversion of natural phenomena.
—Magica Principia, Part 1

100321030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more.
100321030.baseFlair_: Stormy clouds on high, let me be your elemental conduit!
100321030.evoFlair_: Feel my thunderous fury as I fry you to a crisp!

101321060.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
101321060.baseFlair_: Master will be proud of how far my flame-wielding technique has come. Shazah!
101321060.evoEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
101321060.evoFlair_: Next on the list to master: wind magic. Can you imagine the flaming vortexes I'd conjure! If Master could see me now...

105321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly summon a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied followers that has been destroyed during this match and give it Rush. Banish it at the start of your next turn.
105321010.baseFlair_: The best illusions sometimes surpass the originals. One young woman taught me as much. —Illusionary Magic, Chapter 2
105321010.evoFlair_: She said illusions have lives of their own, lives that could be ended at a flick of the wrist. —Illusionary Magic, Chapter 2

111321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+0 and Rush.
111321010.baseFlair_: Most mages are endowed with a natural inquisitiveness. Some view the vulnerable nature of a mortal body as a problem—one they undertake to remedy.
111321010.evoFlair_: Some mages who fuse with the demons they summon lose their minds. Others can master their new demonic bodies and retain their reason. The difference between the two is paper-thin and lies, perhaps, in that inquisitive spirit.

112321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Mysterian Knowledge into your hand.
112321010.baseFlair_: As your re-elected class president, I'd like to make a pledge! Let's join forces to help shape this academy into an even more splendid place to learn! I know we can do it together!
112321010.evoFlair_: Sure the classrooms get blown up sometimes, and students fly through the air... But that's just another part of Mysteria Academy's charm. As class president, I will ensure this academy retains that charm into the next era!

113321020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a Machina card, recover 1 play point. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
113321020.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. Arcane sorcerers can be divided into two groups: practitioners of the arts, and theorycrafters. Mechanized lifeforms fall in a unique space, as they are both. —Research Archives of the Sorcerer's Guild, Vol. 2
113321020.evoFlair_:
A new type of magical life-form... As a product, I suppose it is definitely marketable, but the logic behind such a creation needs to be checked out. I think I can provide a more... graceful solution.
—Mechabook Sorcerer to a Mechanized Lifeform

117321020.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Happy Pig.
117321020.baseFlair_: I'm not actually fond of sweets, you know. If anything, I find them too saccharine for my taste. But the morsels they attract? Why, they're so adorable I could gobble them up. Now how about a nice toffee, my little cream puff?
117321020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Evolve all allied Happy Pigs.
Whenever you play a spell, summon a Happy Pig.
117321020.evoFlair_: The more treats I conjure, the more they gather. Ahh, just look at them. With every bite their pink cheeks grow rounder. Ooh, they really are adorable. But... they've been eating for hours. Surely they've had more than enough?

101331010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Put 3 Conjure Guardians into your hand.
101331010.baseFlair_: A renowned pioneer of modern alchemical methods. Her unquenchable thirst for knowledge is at the root of all her achievements.
101331010.evoFlair_: Perhaps the most refined alchemy adept. Though many follow in her footsteps, none are worthy of stepping into her shoes.

104331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Both players draw cards until each player has 7 cards in their hand.
104331020.baseFlair_: How do you get to be a princess? I sure don't know, so I'll just start studying everything I can find! How'd you like to join me?
104331020.evoFlair_: Once I become a princess, I'll meet a handsome prince, and then we'll be together, and then, well—hee-hee-hee! I just can't wait to be a princess!

105331010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of other Neutral cards in your hand.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Evolve this follower.
105331010.baseFlair_: Being alone is fine with me. Go ahead and make fun of me, but I'm still going to win. That's my whole reason for living.
105331010.evoFlair_: There's no way I'll lose to some grinning fool. I'll win, and everyone will see how great I am!

106331020.baseEffect_:

107331010.baseFlair_: It's all about keeping up appearances, they say. As class president, I have to set an example for everyone!
107331010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle. If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, put a Mysterian Rite into your hand instead.
107331010.evoFlair_: As long as you set your mind to it, surely a bright future awaits you! Come on everybody, let's hit the books!

Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.

Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
114331020.baseFlair_: From forbidden techniques to the arcane arts, I embrace all manner of spellcraft... I refuse to discriminate when it comes to knowledge.

114331020.evoFlair_: I do not adhere to any one mind-set. Taboo, truth... I'll eat my fill of it all. There is no right or wrong when it comes to knowledge.

If this card has been Spellboosted at least 9 times, recover 7 play points.

101333010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon a Guardian Golem.
At the end of your turn, summon a Guardian Golem.
101333010.baseFlair_: Whoa, this could be huge! What's that word again? Oh yeah—eureka!

114332010.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your tenth turn or later, if you can evolve and have at least 1 evolution point, use 1 evolution point and invoke this card.
Until this amulet leaves play give your leader the following effects: Whenever you play a card deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Whenever you play a card, if there are no followers in your deck, recover 1 play point.
114332010.baseFlair_: A faint, insinuating voice guides your footsteps, and you find yourself before an unassuming storefront. Inside that establishment long forgotten by the masses, you feel the heat of countless stares. Selections here are made by the items, you realize, not the customers.

112311010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon an Earth Essence.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
112311010.baseFlair_: Tremble in fear before my power! O, brilliant red! Dwell within my hand and shine... Huh? You think my incantation's too long? That's my strategy, silly! Enemies think I'm going to cast a spell, so they drop their guard and get closer... Then I just use my sword instead!
112311010.evoFlair_: As a magic user who wields a sword, there are a lot of things I'd like to say to her... But there's no point preaching to a mage that they're doing it wrong. —Blade Mage

113311020.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
113311020.baseFlair_: The righteous mage witnessed it for himself—a bane his sword could not break. An eye for an eye, a curse for a curse. The knight's two swords seemed to bring down a curse on the accursed beasts.
113311020.evoFlair_: The wielder shows no mercy to those who would be cut down, for the twin blades that mete out curses on the accursed beasts. The justice he believed has long perished, but his determination is undying.

109321010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, Choose - Summon an Eldritch Chimera or Eldritch Demon.
109321010.baseFlair_: It's all about method and attention to detail, you know. I guess you could call it dedication to the craft? Anyway, I'm obviously gonna destroy you here, so... Which pup should I do it with?
109321010.evoFlair_: Sure, a result is something you can be proud of, but the process is something you can really savor. Anyway, clearly you're gonna get torn to shreds here—just give me a second to choose how.

115321020.baseEffect_:

----------
Fanfare: Summon a Demonic Shikigami.
Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Rush.
115321020.baseFlair_:
The people grow suspicious of Onmyodo. It is not truth as they had once thought, but power. What kind of power, none can say.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Jin
115321020.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Rush.
115321020.evoFlair_:
The number of Onmyodo practitioners is small. They are unable to defend themselves from the pointed words of so many. Having lost the trust of the people, they are driven from the capital.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Retsu

103331020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Grea the Dragonborn and evolve it.
103331020.baseFlair_: Are you new to Mysteria Academy? I'm Anne, and this is Grea! Looking forward to studying together!
103331020.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
103331020.evoFlair_: I love this academy! Nothing would make me happier than if you learn to love it too!

104331030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Dragon.
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon a Windblast Dragon instead.
104331030.baseFlair_: "True magic is that which lies beyond human knowledge, so dragons are a type of magic." The elder mage muttered the words to his acolytes. "There is value in understanding dragons, value that makes sacrificing one's human form a small price to pay."
104331030.evoFlair_: "Study the wings of the dragon to learn to fly, and study its fangs and claws to learn to rend the earth asunder." As the elder mage spoke these words, its scaled master roared. "One roar is worth a thousand words. This is true learning!"

101341030.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
101341030.baseFlair_: No respect, I tell ya! No wonder the world's torn asunder! Never mind though—a job's a job. Now lemme warm up my staff.
101341030.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 7 damage to a random enemy follower.
101341030.evoFlair_: Not a scratch, huh? Maybe I've lost my touch after all. Or maybe you're Death, waitin' to take what's owed, eh? Then gimme ya best, pal!

107341020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Transform all Earth Sigil amulets in your hand into Veridic Rituals. Then perform Earth Rite (X): Put X Veridic Rituals into your hand. X equals the number of Earth Sigil amulets in play.
107341020.baseFlair_: As the world is filled with sin, so shall its veins be with a magical lifeforce. Its purpose is but one—with sin, comes punishment.
107341020.evoFlair_: All sins will meet their judgment without discrimination. Until the world has been purified once more, this armor shall not rest.

115341030.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Earth Sigil
Your leader can't take more than 4 damage at a time.
At the start of your turn, perform Earth Rite: If an earlier-played Earth Sigil amulet is destroyed this way, restore 1 defense to your leader.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Gain +X/+X. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets destroyed this match. Deal Y damage to an enemy. Y equals this follower's attack.
115341030.baseFlair_: Causality is equivalent to truth. Zero is zero. One hundred is one hundred. That balance is forever unchanging... or it was. However, now the forbidden arts make a mockery of causality.
115341030.evoFlair_: Both nothingness and infinity are now possible. Equality can be rewritten, distorted, using a taboo practice capable of deceiving the heavens. Beyond the bounds of reason, the mage smiles calmly.

116341010.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Draw cards until your hand is full or you draw a card without Spellboost. Spellboost those cards 3 times.
116341010.baseFlair_:
Time, space, dimension, fate... These are normally linchpins of reality, but the grinning witch picked through them all like faulty locks.
"Uh, how about a real challenge?"
116341010.evoFlair_:
The grinning witch mocks the impossible as easily as she grasps the infinite. Unbridled and free, her power is always on display.
"With a bang and a boom!"

100314070.baseEffect_:

----------
Destroy an enemy follower.
100314070.baseFlair_: A single caress burns, but an embrace turns you to ash.

713314010.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Destroy an enemy follower.
713314010.baseFlair_: You who were left behind by time, who forgot the benevolence bestowed on you... Now you and your dream of a great nation shall crumble!

Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.

Storm.
111311020.baseFlair_: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Rid yourself of all but that which is true, and only the veracious will walk the earth.
111311020.evoFlair_: Devour falsehoods beneath the shadow of rites. Seekers of truth shall eradicate the false, and all that remains shall be known as truth.

For components within the prime field, used iron as the medium. Potential was middling. Notably, seems to command other golems. Not intentional result. Failure?
—Note on a Researcher's Desk
116311030.evoFlair_:
Observation about golem: Uses magic elements itself and builds friends. My only talent is experimentation. Subject seems more human than myself.
—Note on a Researcher's Desk

Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------

110331010.baseFlair_: For the academy and everyone in it, I'm going to unleash my true power—no holding back! You're gonna see what I'm made of!
110331010.evoFlair_: I'm not scared of a fight... What frightens me is the thought of my friends getting hurt. So I'll protect them, whatever it takes!

114331010.baseEffect_:
Storm.

When this follower comes into play, gain +X/+0. X equals the number of allied Naterran Great Trees you've played this match.
114331010.baseFlair_: O flowing, mutable water, master of gentle change and of conservation. Cardinal direction: West. Domain of the Undines. You who chill and irrigate. Please, rest easy. We are here for you.
114331010.evoFlair_: O flowing, mutable water, master of gentle change and of conservation. Cardinal direction: West. Domain of the Undines. You who chill and irrigate. It isn't that I crave power... but my companion is angry.

Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.

101341010.evoFlair_: Staring at the white castle walls that conceal his chained master, he clenches his graveled fists and then strikes.

103341010.baseFlair_: A witch who left the world far behind and lives outside the confines of nature's laws. Her magic alters the face of reality.
103341010.evoFlair_: With but a murmur, the witch transcends barriers and boundaries, as well as distances and dimensions. Her blazing scarlet eyes see futures others can't even dream of.

These effects will last until the end of the turn this card is played.
104341010.baseFlair_: A wordwielder who can curse a person, a city, or the very essence of a thing with but a single word. When her lips part, calamity slithers forth.
104341010.evoFlair_: The words she whispers drift into the sky and coalesce into disaster. She yearns for tiny misfortunes, silent death, and widespread ruin.

106341020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal a pool of 3 damage divided between all enemies. First deal damage to the earliest-played enemy follower. (If there is enough damage in the pool, deal damage equal to that follower's defense.) Then deal damage to other enemy followers in the order they were played. If any damage is left in the pool afterward, deal it to the enemy leader.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more damage.
106341020.baseFlair_: Their grimoires were comprehensive, and their experiments were superlative. But a god named caprice would make it all crumble to dust. —Terminus Necessarius, Chapter 3
106341020.evoFlair_: Mankind's self-guided destiny is worthless before the caprice that gods employ. Our endeavors, therefore, lie prostrate before the whims of the gods. —Terminus Necessarius, Chapter 12

108341020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Select a card in your hand, and put copies of it into your hand until it is full. (A hand can hold 9 cards.)
At the start of your turn, evolve this follower.
108341020.baseFlair_: A voice to agitate all within my skull. A groan. She had reconstructed the very essence of my being. It was then that I had a realization: "Yes, magic, in truth, is..." —Grimy scrap of paper
108341020.evoEffect_:
(Doesn't have Ward.)
Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand 10 times.
108341020.evoFlair_: A voice, a groan, and the tune's meaning gradually became clear to me. She reconstructed me as I should be. Ah, I'm through, but how very wonderful... —Grimy scrap of paper

113341010.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Put a Ginger's Curse into your hand.
113341010.baseFlair_: A wordwielder who would bring forth disaster. A demon who would bring forth unspeakable terror. Through their fated encounter, an exchanging of words—the birth of love. For this is Ville de l'Amour, a town brimming with the miracles of love. —Ville de l'Amour, An Encounter
113341010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, put a Ginger's Curse into your hand. (This effect is not stackable.)
113341010.evoFlair_: A wordwielder who believed not in true love. She uttered to the demon, "If your love was born of a curse, perish before my sight!" The demon fled, yet disaster remained imminent. —Ville de l'Amour, A Parting

900334020.baseEffect_: Deal 8 damage to an enemy follower.

100321010.baseFlair_: Come hither and hearken well. The sound of my shackles shattering heralds the beginning of the end.
100321010.evoFlair_: With rebirth comes metamorphosis. Pity none shall be left to see it once my rapturous flames have scorched this earth.

112331020.baseEffect_:

----------
Fanfare: Recover 10 play points.
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Banish all cards in your hand, then draw 9 cards.
112331020.baseFlair_: The unknown exists within the known. How long has it been since I last set foot in this land? One must consider the past to uncover the future... And as I am now, I am confident that I am capable of doing just that.
112331020.evoFlair_: By refining the known, one can discover the unknown. The quest for knowledge is never-ending. Constant effort will yield success.

115341010.baseFlair_:
A noisy crowd of people is worth less than the sum of its parts. Those things you call "knowledge" and "wisdom" are destined to fade away like the morning dew. (What a waste of time. How about we end this?)
I command the five elements. (You're finished.)

115341010.evoFlair_:
(You crowd together like that to study?)

(What a waste of time. How about we end this?)

For each card fused to this follower, subtract 2 from its cost.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Return all allied Machina followers (excluding Regalore, Steel Chimera) to your hand. Summon an Assembly Droid for each follower returned to your hand. Then, give all allied Assembly Droids +X/+X and Rush. X equals half the number of cards fused to this card rounded up.
116341020.baseFlair_: After they saw their creation shake the earth, call the rain, stoke new fire, and summon old wind, the machinists rejoiced. They had created a being that could subjugate nature itself—never mind the magical perversion it left in its wake to do so.
116341020.evoFlair_:
Gaian crown, aquan claws, flamen tail, aeroan horns... It's composed of the same elements as we. To pervert creation is folly, and I shall teach you of your ignorance, foolish cretins.
—Uhlein, Grand Magus
